mapper.select: SELECT denname, dencontact, denaddress, imagecontenttype, imagefilename, denowner, denregistno, denlongitude, denlatitude FROM deninfo
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO deninfo (denname, dencontact, denaddress, imagecontenttype, imagefilename, denowner, denregistno, denlongitude, denlatitude) VALUES (#{denname}, #{dencontact}, #{denaddress}, #{imagecontenttype}, #{imagefilename}, #{denowner}, #{denregistno}, #{denlongitude}, #{denlatitude})
mapper.update: UPDATE deninfo SET denname=#{denname}, dencontact=#{dencontact}, denaddress=#{denaddress}, imagecontenttype=#{imagecontenttype}, imagefilename=#{imagefilename}, denowner=#{denowner}, denregistno=#{denregistno}, denlongitude=#{denlongitude}, denlatitude=#{denlatitude}
